attributes.action: Tighten The Rules for fit and proper persons act to run football club to be strengthened.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge you to tighten the rules on how can and cannot own and run a football club, as  you may know, Chester City Football Club have had their Company Voluntary Arrangement revoked despite this being agreed by our administrators Refresh Recovery Ltd. This now means that after being relegated from the football league last season, Chester City have been forced to cancel all of their pre-season friendlies and may be forced to miss the start of the season and may have a further point penalty or even further relegation because of 1 man. Please support us in our hour of need.
